version_description:
• improved startup time on beach cams
• found and fixed a handful of edge case crashes.

- Personalized Surf Feed delivers forecasts, news, and videos based on the Favorites you select
- Reimagined Cam & Report page quickly delivers critical surf conditions
- Bug fixes and optimizations

We've updated our Forecast page to be super fast, changed the audio control settings to be more intuitive, and repaired some minor dings you may have noticed. We're looking for Beta testers!!! Email mobile@surfline.com!!!

For all the new users out there, we've rebuilt the onboarding in this version of the app. For any of our users that have an Apple Watch, opt into our Beta program by entering your email at the link below and selecting the Apple Watch option.

http://discover.surfline.com/beta/

We've been working on a few tweaks to our cams for all our users and a big UI update for anyone participating in the Sessions project.
We've been working on a few tweaks to our cams for all our users and a big UI update for anyone participating in the Sessions project.

In this build, we're excited to introduce Surfline Sessions. This new feature allows anyone with an Apple Watch to track their surf sessions. If tracked in front of a Surfline camera, users will get Sessions video clips of each wave ridden sent directly to their iOS app. Check out the middle tab on the app to learn more.

If you're a fan of Surfline Sessions, we'd like to give credit to a large contingent of beta testers, who've been helping us test and develop this feature for the past 3-6 months.

Other additional goodies for our cam and reports/forecast product.

This update is all about the Cams! We've made some great updates to the full screen video players for Sessions, Live Cams, and Cam Rewinds.
This update is all about the Cams! We've made some great updates to the full screen video players for Sessions, Live Cams, and Cam Rewinds.
Minor updates to our video player and backend changes to entitlements that most users won't notice.
Minor updates to our video player and backend changes to entitlements that most users won't notice.

We've made some quick tweaks for iOS13, the News Feed, Sessions, and more!

- View all the best stories in the News Feed with a better algorithm.
- Use the editing feature to change spots, rename, or even delete a session you don't want!

We've made some quick tweaks for iOS13, the News Feed, Sessions, and more!

- View all the best stories in the News Feed with a better algorithm.
- Use the editing feature to change spots, rename, or even delete a session you don't want!

Surf as long as you want and if your Apple Watch runs out of battery during your session, we'll still save what you've got tracked!

Get from your Session Feed to your Sessions Clips faster with some new tap behaviors.

More spot options when editing your sessions to make sure you get the right clips.

Surf as long as you want and if your Apple Watch runs out of battery during your session, we'll still save what you've got tracked!

Get from your Session Feed to your Sessions Clips faster with some new tap behaviors.

More spot options when editing your sessions to make sure you get the right clips.

Some long awaited updates!!!

- Updates to the News Feed: Try swiping left and right to get to the next article or just going into more and more videos after watching one in an article.
- Tweaks to improve the video player when a cam is down.
- Colors of expired/old reports show up gray and more defined so you don't spend time reading them before realizing they are old.

Some long awaited updates!!!

- Updates to the News Feed: Try swiping left and right to get to the next article or just going into more and more videos after watching one in an article.
- Tweaks to improve the video player when a cam is down.
- Colors of expired/old reports show up gray and more defined so you don't spend time reading them before realizing they are old.

This version has a lot of great updates:

- If you surf at a spot with a cam, we now send you Push Notifications when your clips are done generating!
- We've shifted to Apple maps and made some great updates to the "Explore" tab and created some UI to help you get an idea of where to best track your sessions!

This version has a lot of great updates:

- If you surf at a spot with a cam, we now send you Push Notifications when your clips are done generating!
- We've shifted to Apple maps and made some great updates to the "Explore" tab and created some UI to help you get an idea of where to best track your sessions!

- First of tides in your Apple Watch while you're surfing, just press "Start"!
- Other Minor tests and updates.

- First of tides in your Apple Watch while you're surfing, just press "Start"!
- Other Minor tests and updates.
Another crash fix that was affecting a small number of shredders. Thanks for your feedback!!!
Another crash fix that was affecting a small number of shredders. Thanks for your feedback!!!

A reminder for those of you who keep forgetting to stop your session after surfing.

Another crash fix and performance enhancements. Thanks for the feedback.

A reminder for those of you who keep forgetting to stop your session after surfing.

Another crash fix and performance enhancements. Thanks for the feedback.

We haven't stopped improving while in Quarantine:

- Performance updates for spot loading.
- UI/UX for Sessions to edit a session if it is attached to the wrong spot.
- Ability to remove a wave from the caught list if was an error in the algorithm (we're working to improve this now).
- Minor fixes to some Push Notification issues.

We haven't stopped improving while in Quarantine:

- Performance updates for spot loading.
- UI/UX for Sessions to edit a session if it is attached to the wrong spot.
- Ability to remove a wave from the caught list if was an error in the algorithm (we're working to improve this now).
- Minor fixes to some Push Notification issues.

- Bug fix for some sessions not syncing to database.
- UI/UX for Sessions to edit a session if it is attached to the wrong spot.
- Ability to remove a wave from the caught list if was an error in the algorithm (we're working to improve this now).
- Minor fixes to some Push Notification issues.

- Bug fix for some sessions not syncing to database.
- UI/UX for Sessions to edit a session if it is attached to the wrong spot.
- Ability to remove a wave from the caught list if was an error in the algorithm (we're working to improve this now).
- Minor fixes to some Push Notification issues.
Hot Fix for a nasty bug we found in the Sessions Watch App that could have caused you to lose a session you were tracking. Please let us know if this still happens for you.
Hot Fix for a nasty bug we found in the Sessions Watch App that could have caused you to lose a session you were tracking. Please let us know if this still happens for you.
Minor fixes. Working on some new features to be released over the next few weeks!
Minor fixes. Working on some new features to be released over the next few weeks!
We're stoked to give you access to our newest Feature, Surf Alerts. Look in your account section to set them up!
We're stoked to give you access to our newest Feature, Surf Alerts. Look in your account section to set them up!
Hot fix for an issue for our registered users. Thank you for your patience while we fixed this.
Hot fix for an issue for our registered users. Thank you for your patience while we fixed this.

- Another hot fix for a bug that is draining some users' batteries in the background.
- Fix for Cam Rewind orientation change.

- Another hot fix for a bug that is draining some users' batteries in the background.
- Fix for Cam Rewind orientation change.

Minor updates to improve your experience finding waves.

This should also fix an issues a few users had of being stuck or delayed upon opening the app.

Minor updates to improve your experience finding waves.

This should also fix an issues a few users had of being stuck or delayed upon opening the app.
Several updates to the Apple Watch App. Let us know how it's working, email support@surfline.com.
Several updates to the Apple Watch App. Let us know how it's working, email support@surfline.com.

Some bug fixes for the watch app. Please let us know if you are still experiencing any issues below!
- Sessions stopping in the middle of a surf session.
- Extra long sessions.
- Sessions not syncing.

Some bug fixes for the watch app. Please let us know if you are still experiencing any issues below!
- Sessions stopping in the middle of a surf session.
- Extra long sessions.
- Sessions not syncing.
Fix for swell graph unit issues and minor bug fixes.
Fix for swell graph unit issues and minor bug fixes.
Major bug fix for Watch App crashing during a surf session. Let us know if it is fixed. If you haven't tracked a session yet, now is a great time.
Major bug fix for Watch App crashing during a surf session. Let us know if it is fixed. If you haven't tracked a session yet, now is a great time.

Some bug fixes:

- Cam Rewind not defaulting to the most recent 10 min clip
- Unit bugs in the widget
- Minor Sessions polish
- If you have experienced any issues with your Apple Watch crashing during a Session, please reach out to support@surfline.com

Some bug fixes:

- Cam Rewind not defaulting to the most recent 10 min clip
- Unit bugs in the widget
- Minor Sessions polish
- If you have experienced any issues with your Apple Watch crashing during a Session, please reach out to support@surfline.com
Minor ding repairs and performance updates.
Minor ding repairs and performance updates.
iOS 14 updates and minor updates to the Sessions experiences, including a download icon for your Session Clips straight to your phone.
iOS 14 updates and minor updates to the Sessions experiences, including a download icon for your Session Clips straight to your phone.
Bug fixes and updates to our forecast system, which we will open up for Beta testing to our Premium users.
Bug fixes and updates to our forecast system, which we will open up for Beta testing to our Premium users.

We've rolled out a new way to send you timely and helpful messages in the app. This includes:

- More informative push notifications for surf conditions, events, and features.
- Messages in the app to improve your experience and empower you to paddle out at the right place and time.

We've also fixed a Sessions bug—now your Apple Watch will no longer get stuck on the Login screen if you're logged in on your phone.

We've rolled out a new way to send you timely and helpful messages in the app. This includes:

- More informative push notifications for surf conditions, events, and features.
- Messages in the app to improve your experience and empower you to paddle out at the right place and time.

We've also fixed a Sessions bug—now your Apple Watch will no longer get stuck on the Login screen if you're logged in on your phone.
